text: Gergő Bruckmann (born 14 July 1995) is a Hungarian modern pentathlete. He participated at the 2018 World Modern Pentathlon Championships, winning a medal.Mixed relay results, uipmworld.org; accessed 22 July 2020. ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Hungarian male modern pentathletes Category:World Modern Pentathlon Championships medalists Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Gergő Bruckmann
